subject: Baseball
Records and Achievements
Archives and Records
lead_paragraph: David Wright passed Ed Kranepool as the Mets’ career hit leader with an infield single in the third inning of the Mets’ victory. R. A. Dickey will try for his 20th win of the season on Thursday.
snippet: David Wright passed Ed Kranepool as the Mets’ career hit leader with an infield single in the third inning of the Mets’ victory. R. A. Dickey will try for his 20th win of the season on Thursday.
